mapper.insert: INSERT INTO exam (title, description, course_id, teacher_id, begin_time, end_time, created_time, updated_time, status) VALUES (#{title}, #{description}, #{courseId}, #{teacherId}, #{beginTime}, #{endTime}, now(), now(), status)
mapper.update:
UPDATE exam SET
title = #{title},
description = #{description},
course_id = #{courseId},
teacher_id = #{teacherId},
begin_time = #{beginTime},
end_time = #{endTime},
updated_time = now() where id = #{id};
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM exam WHERE id = #{id} AND status = 1
